short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: uuGle Chrome extension provides fast and user-friendly searching across Unicorn bookkit and dockit books in browser search bar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
uuGle automatically indexes every Unicorn bookkit book you open. Just open any single page of any bookkit book in your browser and all pages of that book will be indexed and available for search further on.

Click extension icon or use keyboard shortcut and type a keyword start search in indexed content. You don't need to type whole word, search words are automatically expanded. E.g. type "trans" and search results containing word "transaction" will be suggested. This can be used to quickly find uuCommand designs: e.g. type "trans list" to search for transaction/list CMD.

For more details and user guide see https://github.com/Pocuston/uugle.

Please note, that Unicorn bookkit books are available only to registered Plus4U users. For others this extension will not work and has no use. For more details see https://www.plus4u.net/.
